column1: bertha "" betty "" j. tyson| bertha j. "" betty "" tyson stratford
column6: june 18th. betty worked as a book keeper at cherry hill distribution lindenwold
column7: new jersey and was a bus aid at mc. gough bus company working until the day she fell ill. wife of the late charles burtis tyson. mother of c. scott tyson and susan ( john ) stevenson. grandmother of matthew
column8: christopher and jason. sister of dorothy ( fred) busch. funeral service and burial at berlin cemetery berlin
column9: nj. will be private. eugene j. zale funeral home
